channel.title: RuneLegend - Development team - {{Recruiting}}
channel.description:
[B][U]Introduction[/U][/B]
[I]Hey, I'm I R Gurd Aka Ben, and I am the owner of RuneLegend, I have been coding servers for a while now and have decided to start a proper project. So I decided to turn to all the people that have helped me in the past to learn the basics. If you would like to join me, a few of my friends and my brother to create the best server and community, sign up with the following format:[/I]
[CODE][B]Position:[/B] [B]Country:[/B] [B]IRL Name:[/B] [B]MSN/IMing Address:[/B] [B]Experience:[/B] [B]Why Do You Want To Join Us?[/B][/CODE]
[B][U]The list of positions that are available are the following:[/U][/B]
[B][U]Owner(s):[/U][/B] (closed)
[I]Ben / I R Gurd (Me)[/I]
[B][U]Co-Owner(s):[/U][/B] (closed)
[I]Jordan / Code 4 Fun (My friend)[/I]
[B][U]Server Coder(s):[/U][/B] (closed)
[I]Ben / I R Gurd (Me) Jordan / Code 4 Fun (My friend)[/I]
[B][U]Client Coder(s):[/U][/B]
[I]sw1tchez -[/I]
[B][U]Graphics Master(s):[/U][/B]
[I]- -[/I]
[B][U]J Frame Creator(s):[/U][/B]
-Cash -
[B][U]Adminastrator(s): (Will be promoted from the Modertor position)[/U][/B] [I] Andrew (My Brother) - - - -[/I]
[B][U]Global Moderator(s): (will be judged from countries so the forums and server will be moderated neerly all the time) [/U][/B] [I]Brad ~Soulja Boi~ Pkrmaster01 - -[/I]
[B][U]Forum Moderator(s): (will be judged from countries so the forums will be moderated neerly all the time) [/U][/B] [I]- 0wnd - pur3frostyx3 - - -[/I]
[B][U]What will you be required to do?[/U][/B]
[B]Client Coder(s):[/B] [I]You will be required to make the client to support the items that will be on a list that will be given to you. You will also be required to give weekly reports on your progress. You will also have to add the J Frame Creator(s) MSN, so that when they are finished they can send you the custom J Frame so you can add it into the client, Finaly, you will be required to add me and Jordan on MSN so we can talk about what you need to do.[/I] [B]Graphics Master(s):[/B] [I]You will be required to design the background for the client and the banner for the forums, Finaly, you will be required to add me and Jordan on MSN so we can talk about what you need to do.[/I]
[B]J Frame Creator(s):[/B] [I]You will be required to make a cool J Frame for the client, You will also have to add the Client Coder(s) MSN, so that when finished you can send them the J Frame so they can add it into the client.[/I]
[B]Global Moderator(s):[/B] [I]You will be required to add the other Moderators, Me and Jordan on MSN, You will be required to be active on the forums, and in-game when the server is released.[/I]
[B]Forum Moderator(s):[/B] [I]You will be required to add the other Moderators, Me and Jordan on MSN, You will also be required to stay active on the forums and keep the other members under control whilst they are on the forums.[/I]
[U][B]Forum adress: [URL=http://runelegendz.freeforums.org/]http://runelegendz.freeforums.org/[/URL][/B][/U]
[U][B]MSN adresses:[/B][/U] Me: [EMAIL="b3n-kn0ck-2k7@hotmail.co.uk"]b3n-kn0ck-2k7@hotmail.co.uk[/EMAIL] Jordan: [EMAIL="j0rd4n-w4lzh-2k7@hotmail.com"]j0rd4n-w4lzh-2k7@hotmail.com[/EMAIL] Brad: [EMAIL="bradjeffs@hotmail.co.uk"]bradjeffs@hotmail.co.uk[/EMAIL] Pur3frostyx3: [EMAIL="cars4evaz@hotmail.com"]cars4evaz@hotmail.com[/EMAIL] 0wnd: [EMAIL="blondie425425@hotmail.com"]blondie425425@hotmail.com[/EMAIL] ~Solja boi~: [EMAIL="brendenholowach@hotmail.com"]brendenholowach@hotmail.com[/EMAIL] Cash [EMAIL]deefprince@hotmail.com[/EMAIL] Pkrmaster01 [EMAIL]jake-camilleri@hotmail.com [/EMAIL](Other members e-mails and MSN adresses will be posted in this list so mods and other people that need to add other members of the team easily)
[B][I]Thanks, Ben / I R Gurd.
